trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to the collection.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> that was added to the collection.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to locate.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Copies the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> at the specified index.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
The index in the `array` where copying begins.
Returns the index of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to locate.
The index of the of value in the , if found; otherwise, -1.

Inserts a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> into the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index where `value` should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> specified.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> specified.
The specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref>.
Removes a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
